title: A website for taking selfies using NYC traffic cameras. “People can then...
content:
A website for taking selfies using NYC traffic cameras. ‚ÄúPeople can then use the traffic camera like a photo booth by posing for three seconds and tapping on the screen. The webpage will then show the most recent image from the traffic camera.‚Äù
